alert.note: Alert for Knox; Marshall; McLean; Peoria; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 26 at 2:27AM CDT until July 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 110 expected. * WHERE...Knox, Stark, Peoria, Marshall, Woodford, Tazewell and McLean Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur. The impacts of heat are cumulative, and are amplified with extended exposure. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is potential for the higher heat index to linger into Saturday, but that is less certain at this time.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Knox; Marshall; McLean; Peoria; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford
